title: Weekly Favorites: Cozy Finds & Holiday Charm
description: It’s that time again—sharing some of my weekly favorites straight from your recommendations and the cozy finds that just make life a little sweeter. I love that you all get excited about these round-ups because it’s like we’re shopping and decorating together each week. Let’s dive in! 1. Pawz Hazel Platform Clog in Black Starting […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: It’s that time again—sharing some of my weekly favorites straight from your recommendations and the cozy finds that just make life a little sweeter. I love that you all get excited about these round-ups because it’s like we’re shopping and decorating together each week. Let’s dive in! 1. Pawz Hazel Platform Clog in Black Starting […]
text: It’s that time again—sharing some of my weekly favorites straight from your recommendations and the cozy finds that just make life a little sweeter. I love that you all get excited about these round-ups because it’s like we’re shopping and decorating together each week. Let’s dive in!1. Pawz Hazel Platform Clog in BlackStarting with these cozy-chic black clogs! They’re an easy slip-on option with that chunky platform trend we’re all loving right now. Imagine pairing them with some thick socks and your favorite sweater—instant comfort and style! 2. No Boundaries Mid Rise Porkchop Flare PantsThese flare jeans have just the right amount of distressing! Perfect for anyone craving that effortlessly cool, vintage look that still feels polished. I love how these flares work with ankle boots or sneakers—add a cozy knit, and you’re set for a stylish day out. 3. Scentsationals Vintage Wax WarmerLet’s talk cozy ambiance! This vintage-inspired wax warmer is a game-changer for filling your space with seasonal scents, and it’s so pretty on display. Whether it’s cinnamon spice for fall or pine for the holidays, this little warmer brings those comforting aromas to life. 4. Modern Moments Sibling Matching SweaterHow sweet is this little sweater? It’s the perfect sibling match for your littles, with soft, cozy vibes that are just right for holiday photos or casual family days. I love the classic knit design that’ll have your kiddos looking cute and comfy. 5. Time and Tru Mock Neck SweaterIf you’re like me and love a good mock neck, this sweater is a must! It’s one of those soft, versatile pieces that can go from cozy days at home to dinner with friends. Tuck it into jeans or layer with a long skirt—such a dreamy staple for the colder months. 6. Hearth & Hand™ Scalloped Brass Christmas Card HolderThis scalloped brass card holder feels like it belongs in an old-world farmhouse, and it’s an elegant way to display holiday cards! I love its antique-inspired look, and it’s so pretty that it could double as a year-round piece for displaying photos or postcards. 7. Holiday Time Santa Candle HolderIf you’re decorating for the holidays already, this Santa candle holder is the cutest festive addition. Its timeless design would look darling on a mantle or holiday tablescape. Add your favorite candle, and it’ll bring a soft, cozy glow to any room! Red, White & Silver Symbols of Christmas Shatterproof OrnamentsThese ornaments are simple yet elegant, and they add such a peaceful charm to any holiday decor. Whether on your tree, in a decorative bowl, or styled with greenery, they’re perfect for that cozy farmhouse feel. 9. 35″ White Paper TreeThis white paper tree is a simple and eco-friendly way to add a bit of winter wonder to any space. It’s perfect for adding a Scandinavian-inspired touch to a holiday setup—whether it’s as a dining table centerpiece or as part of a mantle display. 10. Time and Tru Classic ClogsLast but not least, another favorite cozy clog! These classic clogs come in a variety of colors, making them an ideal comfy option for every day. I love the effortless look of clogs for running errands or just lounging at home. Thank you so much for stopping by the blog today and sharing in this week’s favorites! Whether you’re here for the holiday decor, cozy wear, or those simple pieces that make every day a little more special, I love curating these finds with you in mind. Be sure to let me know in the comments if any of these favorites made it into your home this week—I can’t wait to see how you style them!Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!
html:
It’s that time again—sharing some of my weekly favorites straight from your recommendations and the cozy finds that just make life a little sweeter. I love that you all get excited about these round-ups because it’s like we’re shopping and decorating together each week. Let’s dive in!

1. Pawz Hazel Platform Clog in Black

Starting with these cozy-chic black clogs! They’re an easy slip-on option with that chunky platform trend we’re all loving right now. Imagine pairing them with some thick socks and your favorite sweater—instant comfort and style!

2. No Boundaries Mid Rise Porkchop Flare Pants

These flare jeans have just the right amount of distressing! Perfect for anyone craving that effortlessly cool, vintage look that still feels polished. I love how these flares work with ankle boots or sneakers—add a cozy knit, and you’re set for a stylish day out.

3. Scentsationals Vintage Wax Warmer

Let’s talk cozy ambiance! This vintage-inspired wax warmer is a game-changer for filling your space with seasonal scents, and it’s so pretty on display. Whether it’s cinnamon spice for fall or pine for the holidays, this little warmer brings those comforting aromas to life.

4. Modern Moments Sibling Matching Sweater

How sweet is this little sweater? It’s the perfect sibling match for your littles, with soft, cozy vibes that are just right for holiday photos or casual family days. I love the classic knit design that’ll have your kiddos looking cute and comfy.

5. Time and Tru Mock Neck Sweater

If you’re like me and love a good mock neck, this sweater is a must! It’s one of those soft, versatile pieces that can go from cozy days at home to dinner with friends. Tuck it into jeans or layer with a long skirt—such a dreamy staple for the colder months.

6. Hearth & Hand™ Scalloped Brass Christmas Card Holder

This scalloped brass card holder feels like it belongs in an old-world farmhouse, and it’s an elegant way to display holiday cards! I love its antique-inspired look, and it’s so pretty that it could double as a year-round piece for displaying photos or postcards.

7. Holiday Time Santa Candle Holder

If you’re decorating for the holidays already, this Santa candle holder is the cutest festive addition. Its timeless design would look darling on a mantle or holiday tablescape. Add your favorite candle, and it’ll bring a soft, cozy glow to any room!

Red, White & Silver Symbols of Christmas Shatterproof Ornaments

These ornaments are simple yet elegant, and they add such a peaceful charm to any holiday decor. Whether on your tree, in a decorative bowl, or styled with greenery, they’re perfect for that cozy farmhouse feel.

9. 35″ White Paper Tree

This white paper tree is a simple and eco-friendly way to add a bit of winter wonder to any space. It’s perfect for adding a Scandinavian-inspired touch to a holiday setup—whether it’s as a dining table centerpiece or as part of a mantle display.

10. Time and Tru Classic Clogs

Last but not least, another favorite cozy clog! These classic clogs come in a variety of colors, making them an ideal comfy option for every day. I love the effortless look of clogs for running errands or just lounging at home.

Thank you so much for stopping by the blog today and sharing in this week’s favorites! Whether you’re here for the holiday decor, cozy wear, or those simple pieces that make every day a little more special, I love curating these finds with you in mind. Be sure to let me know in the comments if any of these favorites made it into your home this week—I can’t wait to see how you style them!

Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!
